text: Julius Jolly Julius August Isaak Jolly (21 February 1823, Mannheim - 14 October 1891, Karlsruhe) was a German politician. From 1868 to 1876 he was Staatsminister and head of government for the Grand Duchy of Baden. His brother was the physicist Philipp von Jolly. == Bibliography== * * * Robert Goldschmit: Julius Jolly. In: Badische Biographien. title: Julius Jolly (politician)
